code: import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import{thunk}from"redux-thunk";import{composeWithDevTools}from"redux-devtools-extension";import product from"./reducer/product";const reducers=combineReducers({products:product});const initialState={};const middleware=[thunk];const store=createStore(reducers,initialState,composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware(...middleware)));export default store;
